channel.title: Name at the top of client gone
channel.description:
How do i add a text at a top of the client if it's not there? i got in gui.java [CODE]public static String frameTitle = "Project-Reborn Client V2. Created by Mod Blitz";[/CODE] In gui.java but when i compile and run tere is still nothing there.
If i am missing something could you please tell me what to add and were. Thanks.

item.title: Name at the top of client gone
item.dc:creator: @tman915 tman915
item.description:
@tman915 wrote:

It could be because you are using vista/windows 7.
that happened to me, i was using windows xp, and the name was there.
but then i loaded it on my other comp with xp, and it wasn’t there.

Read full topic
item.source: Name at the top of client gone
